column4: when setting up ubuntu partitions I currently have a 500gb drive with winxp using the first 125gb trying to figure out if the /boot partition is to be primary or logical?
it doesn't matter. Just have in mind that you can only have 4 primary partitions
ok what size should the boot partition be?
not more than 1 gigabyte. And if you really are new to ubuntu/linux, I'd suggest not using one.
